name: Comete
body:
### Welcome to Comete

Comete is a hobby project developed by Alexander Nilsen. Comete enables the user to use their
Android devices to control FlightGear or MSFS over wireless network with the use of built-in
accelerometer sensors, or using as a instrument panel with often used gauges. Comete supersedes Comete for FlightGear and Alni FlightGear Control.


* This project requires HoloEverywhere

### About Regular Comete
The regular Comete enables the user to control FlightGear or MSFS/P3D over the local network with the accelerometer of the Android device.

The use can stear the craft, use the throttle, gears and brakes. The user can even set the COMM, NAV and transponder frequencies of the craft.

This app also includes basic information about the heading and velocity of the craft.
